channel.title: Aggregated External AI & Tech News
channel.description: Merged headlines from configured external sources

item.title: The Top 5 Nextiva Alternatives for 2025 (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: Discover the best Nextiva alternatives. We break down leading VoIP solutions to help you choose the ideal platform for communication and growth.

item.title: ‘Job Hugging’ Trend Emerges as Workers Confront AI Uncertainty (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: AI anxiety fuels “job hugging” as workers stay put despite wanting higher pay, career growth, and remote options when conditions improve.

item.title: This is Europe’s Most Valuable AI Startup Now, Thanks to €1.3 Billion Investment (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: ASML invested €1.3B in Mistral AI’s Series C, becoming top shareholder and lifting the startup’s value to €10B, Europe’s largest AI firm.

item.title: Did Meta Cover Up Child Safety Risks in VR? (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: Two current and two former Meta employees will bring internal documents before a Senate Judiciary subcommittee. Meta said allegations were "stitched together."

item.title: Microsoft Copilot Study: UK Government Finds No Evidence of Productivity Gains (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: The UK government’s Microsoft 365 Copilot trial found staff satisfied and tasks eased, but no clear productivity gains, raising doubts about AI’s workplace impact.

item.title: Get Seven Iconic MS Office Programs for Just $25 (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: This bundle gives you lifetime access to 2019 versions of Excel, Word, Outlook, PowerPoint, Access, Publisher, and OneNote with no subscription or license fees.

item.title: Tesla’s Robot Army Could Make Elon Musk the World’s First Trillionaire (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: Elon Musk's idea of a humanoid robot army that outnumbers humans is raising questions about the future of work.

item.title: Apple Hits Record $9B in India Sales (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: With iPhones doing the heavy lifting and MacBook demand also surging, India has become the new growth engine in the world's most populous nation.

item.title: Microsoft Taps Nebius in $19.4B AI Cloud Agreement (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: Microsoft will gain dedicated capacity from Nebius’ New Jersey facility as AI demand outpaces internal resources.

item.title: Nvidia Unveils Rubin CPX, First in a New Class of AI GPUs (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: The Vera Rubin CPX is built for “massive-context” AI to perform complex coding or generate HD video.

item.title: ‘Catastrophic’ Stakes: OpenAI Restructure Faces Fierce Campaigns and Scrutiny (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: OpenAI’s for-profit shift faces probes, lawsuits, and $19B in investor stakes as regulators and rivals challenge its nonprofit roots and future in AI.

item.title: Anthropic’s Claude AI Can Now Create Spreadsheets, Presentations, and More (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: A new update gives Anthropic’s Claude AI the ability to make spreadsheets and presentations in a move that is simillar to a recent update to OpenAI’s ChatGPT.

item.title: Xero’s JAX Gets Smarter at Predicting When Customers Will Pay (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: The enhanced AI superagent introduces predictive insights and automation, aiming to position JAX for more success in a crowded market.

item.title: This is Apple’s Thinnest iPhone Ever (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: Apple unveiled on Sept. 9 its much-anticipated iPhone 17 line, as well as the iPhone Air, new smartwatches, and AirPods 3.

item.title: Working with PDFs Is a Breeze with PDF Converter Pro (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: PDF Converter Pro is an all-in-one tool that allows you create or convert PDF documents into a variety of formats or from a variety of formats with ease.

item.title: Microsoft Leans on Anthropic’s Claude, Raising Questions About Its OpenAI Ties (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: Microsoft will integrate Anthropic’s Claude into Office 365, citing stronger performance in tasks like Excel and PowerPoint as tensions with OpenAI grow.

item.title: Apple's iPhone 17 has a big anti-spyware upgrade built in - here's what it can do (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: A new memory safety feature on Apple's latest iPhones is designed to fight advanced surveillance.

item.title: 5 business leaders on how to balance innovation with risk - and turn your ideas into action (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Innovation can boost your business and delight your customers, but only if you get your approach right.

item.title: I swapped my favorite Linux desktop for System76's COSMIC alpha - and I have zero regrets (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: I did the unthinkable and installed an alpha release as my Linux daily driver. Here's how it's going.

item.title: Verizon will give you an iPhone 17 Pro free with trade-in - here's what to know (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: The iPhone 17 is here, and Verizon is offering new and current customers up to $1,100 off any of the new phones, and some free Apple Watch and iPad offers, too. We've got all the details.

item.title: Microsoft said these 400 readers couldn't upgrade to Windows 11. They did it anyway (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Microsoft wanted to pull the plug on these old PCs. Our readers upgraded to Windows 11 anyway.

item.title: Microsoft taps Anthropic for AI in Word and Excel, signaling distance from OpenAI (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Once in a codependent relationship, Microsoft and OpenAI have decided it's probably best if they both start seeing other companies.

item.title: The two tech brands with the most satisfied customers might surprise you (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Looking for a new TV, laptop, or even vacuum cleaner? The American Customer Satisfaction Index can help.

item.title: The best iPhone 17 cases of 2025 (including the Air, Pro, and Max models) (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: ZDNET editors have tested dozens of iPhone cases over the years to help you choose the right one for your new iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, or iPhone 17 Pro Max.

item.title: iOS 26 update is coming soon - how to download it (and which iPhones support it) (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook says iOS 26 has been the most popular beta ever, and the general release is only days away. Here's how you can install it.

item.title: Nomad's latest Apple Watch band is bright enough to stop traffic - and it's my new favorite (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: The new Tempo Band resembles the older Slim Sport Band - only brighter and better.

item.title: Trade in your old phone and get up to $1,100 off a new iPhone 17 at AT&T - here's how (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: AT&T has deals on the new iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone Air. Here are all the details.

item.title: Former WhatsApp Security Chief Sues Meta, Citing Major Privacy Risks (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: Ex-WhatsApp security chief Attaullah Baig is suing Meta and alleging the company ignored flaws that put billions at risk. Meta denies the claims, noting the employee’s dismissal for poor performance.

item.title: Every iPhone that can be updated to iOS 26 (and when you can install it) (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Here's a list of iPhone models that support the next iOS update - and which ones won't run Apple's latest update.

item.title: iPhone 17 Cheat Sheet: Key Features, Price, and Availability (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: Get tips on maximizing your iPhone 17 experience and choose which model of the Apple device is right for you.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro vs. iPhone 15 Pro: I compared both models, and here's who should upgrade (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Eyeing the new iPhone 17 Pro? Here's how it stacks up against the 15 Pro.

item.title: Malware Injected Into Code Packages That Get 2 Billion+ Downloads Each Week (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: An attack targeting the Node.js ecosystem was just identified — but not before it compromised 18 npm packages that account for billions of weekly downloads.

item.title: That new Claude feature 'may put your data at risk,' Anthropic admits (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Claude AI can now create and edit documents, spreadsheets, and other files. But Anthropic warns that hackers can also use that feature to snag your sensitive data.

item.title: Best VPN services 2025: The fastest VPNs with the best networks, ranked (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: My favorite VPNs offer excellent speeds, expand your streaming content libraries, and provide security and peace of mind.

item.title: Apple Events live updates: iPhone 17, iPhone Air, AirPods Pro 3, and reactions to new wearables (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: ZDNET is reporting on all the news surrounding this week's Apple event, including the iPhone 17 series, which starts at $799, Apple Watch Ultra 3, AirPods Pro 3, and more.

item.title: Apple Watch Series 11 vs. Samsung Galaxy Watch 8: I've tested both, and here's the winner (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Which of the two top smartwatches is the most capable? Here's my verdict after trying both wearables.

item.title: iPhone Air vs. iPhone 17 Pro Max: I compared Apple's two best models, and I'd buy this one (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: The iPhone Air and iPhone 17 Pro Max are two extremes that elevate Apple's smartphones to a new level. So which one should you get?

item.title: T-Mobile will give you a free iPhone 17 Pro right now - how the preorder deal works (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: At T-Mobile, you can get the all-new iPhone 17 Pro for free when you sign up for or switch to the Experience Beyond mobile plan and use a qualifying trade-in.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro Max vs. Google Pixel 10 Pro XL: I compared both phones, and it's a close one (Source: www.zdnet.com)
item.description: Which flagship phone deserves a spot in your pocket? Here's my early verdict based on specs and past experience.

item.title: Become an Ethical Hacker for Only $20 (Source: www.techrepublic.com)
item.description: Train at your own pace to develop ethical hacking skills, even if you don’t have any previous tech experience.
